backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor providing access-controlled user profiles and admin-restricted contact-form submission retrieval and deletion.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing theme‑update and layout‑consistency changes with associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and content of major frontend files across layout, pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining global OKLCH theme tokens for light and dark modes with applied background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root router configuration mapping all site routes and rendering through the shared SiteLayout component.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that checks authentication and admin role, showing appropriate access or error states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
Simple component rendering the construction company’s generated logo image.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Contact form with validation, UI feedback, and backend submission via a React Query mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/design/BrandToke: Centralized object containing brand constants such as company info, contact data, hours, and compliance statement.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, contact info, business hours, and a disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Implements a responsive site header with desktop and mobile navigation and active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageSecti: Reusable layout component that wraps page sections with configurable spacing and container classes.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, footer, and routed page content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Displays a clickable project preview card with image, title, metadata, and category badge.
Shows a modal containing full project details including image, metadata, and long description.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Defines the Project interface and exports a list of sample project data entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity state and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInquiries.ts: Provides hooks to fetch all contact submissions and retrieve the caller's user role using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Simple hook that sets and restores the browser document title.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and stored identity loading.
Mutation hook to submit the contact form through the actor and refresh related admin data.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and global typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays company background, mission, vision, and values using structured sections and cards.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInquiriesP: Admin page showing a list and detail view of contact submissions with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/CompliancePage.tsx: Shows compliance details, licenses, and certifications with categorized lists and descriptive sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides contact information and a message form using card components and brand constants.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, government approval highlights, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Lists project cards and manages a modal for viewing detailed project information.
frontend/src/pages/SafetyQualityPage.tsx: Renders the Safety & Quality page with safety culture text, training/hazard/leadership cards, and page title setup.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a services grid with icons and descriptions plus an approach section, setting the page title.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, requirements, and current state version.
